title: WATERS GeoViewer Web Map
description:
This EPA GeoPlatform hosted web map serves as the foundational map supporting the EPA Office of Water WATERS GeoViewer Web Mapping Application located at https://epa.maps.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=ada349b90c26496ea52aab66a092593b

The web map contains features from the NHDPlus Dataset (https://www.epa.gov/waterdata/nhdplus-national-hydrography-dataset-plus) and data from the Watershed Assessment, Tracking & Environmental Results System (WATERS) (https://www.epa.gov/waterdata/waters-watershed-assessment-tracking-environmental-results-system). Popups are configured for each feature class in the map which provide access to additional feature level attributes.
snippet: This web map displays US EPA Office of Water data offered by the Watershed Assessment, Tracking & Environmental Results System (WATERS).
accessInformation:
Maintainer: US EPA Office of Water.
Data source(s): Various federal, state, local, and water agency.  Acknowledgement of the EPA would be appreciated.
licenseInfo: The user is responsible for reading and evaluating dataset limitations, restrictions, and intended use. For additional information, please see WATERS Terms of Use and Disclaimer.
